title: Fantasy Esports is looking for a commited Mid laner
body:
As said in title Fantasy Esports are looking for a commited Mid laner.  Our members are Diamond 5 and up.  So we are looking to become serious

If you are interested in joining please answer these questions

IGN ?
Role
Top 3 picks
4, Availability
Sub or Starter

replies.body:
IGN GBG727
Role Mid (Main)
Top 3 picks ( Alkali Lb Heimdinger)
4, Availability Mostly evening all days ( Friday, Saturday sometimes not coz of work)
 Well my rank is not good but u guys can solo with me to check thats all i can say
Sorry friend but we cannot take you on, mainly because of your top 3 picks
No offence, but a team of diamonds 5 + Wouldn't really consider a bronze 5.. no matter how good you say you are..

> [{quoted}](name=FBI Robin,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=eLxpMicc,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-05T17:50:20.516+0000)
>
> No offence, but a team of diamonds 5 + Wouldn't really consider a bronze 5.. no matter how good you say you are..

all good no problem dude
